com.jdroid.android.leftnavbar
Class LeftNavBar

java.lang.Object
  android.app.ActionBar
      com.jdroid.android.leftnavbar.LeftNavBar

public class LeftNavBar
extends android.app.ActionBar

TV-specific implementation of the ActionBar API, using the title bar and a left navigation panel.

DISPLAY_AUTO_EXPAND

public static final int DISPLAY_AUTO_EXPAND
Display option for the Left Navigation bar to automatically expand when certain ev ents happen. This includes gaining focus but could also include other events, such as mouse hover.

See Also:
setDisplayOptions(int), setDisplayOptions(int, int), Constant Field Values

public static final int DEFAULT_DISPLAY_OPTIONS
